summary: Comprehensive E2E testing completed for RUNETIC e-commerce platform. All core features verified working: Homepage with RUNETIC branding, product catalog (50 products), product detail with customization options (version, size, packaging), add to cart functionality, checkout page with PSE payment method and bank dropdown, admin login with credentials Runetic.col/1022378240RUNETICSA, and admin profits module. External Railway WOMPI backend is responding correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified working: 1) Homepage loads with RUNETIC branding and hero section, 2) Product catalog displays 50 products with images and prices, 3) Product detail page has version selector (Hombre Fan, Hombre Jugador, Mujer Fan, Niño), size selector, and customization options (Estampado, Parches, Empaque), 4) Add to cart works with toast notification, 5) Checkout page has shipping form, payment methods (PSE, Card, Transfer, Cash on Delivery), PSE bank dropdown with Colombian banks, and WOMPI secure badge, 6) Admin login works with provided credentials, 7) Admin profits module shows revenue, costs, profit, orders table with filters, 8) External Railway WOMPI backend at https://wompi-backend-production-7680.up.railway.app is responding correctly

homepage.details: Homepage loads with RUNETIC branding, hero section, shop now button, wholesale button, stats (250+ products, 100% authentic, 24/7 support)

product_catalog.details: Catalog displays 50 products with images, prices in COP, category badges (FUTBOL)

product_detail.details: Product detail shows image carousel (1/5), version selector with emojis, size selector, quantity controls, customization options (Estampado, Parches, Empaque), price display, add to cart button

add_to_cart.details: Add to cart works, shows toast notification '1 producto agregado al carrito', cart badge updates

checkout_page.details: Checkout page loads with shipping form (name, email, document, phone, address, city, department), payment methods (PSE, Card, Transfer, Cash on Delivery), PSE bank dropdown with Colombian banks, WOMPI secure badge

pse_payment_method.details: PSE payment method shows bank dropdown with Colombian banks (NEQUI, BANCOLOMBIA, etc.), user type selector (Persona Natural/Jurídica)

admin_login.details: Admin login works with credentials Runetic.col / 1022378240RUNETICSA, redirects to /admin dashboard with '¡Bienvenido!' toast

admin_profits.details: Profits module shows Ingresos Totales, Costos Totales, Ganancia Neta, Ticket Promedio, period filter, cost per unit input, orders table with ID/FECHA/CLIENTE/ITEMS/TOTAL/ESTADO/GANANCIA EST., export report button

external_payment_backend.details: External Railway WOMPI backend at https://wompi-backend-production-7680.up.railway.app is running and responding. Health check returns {status: 'ok', message: 'WOMPI Backend Running'}. Payment endpoint exists and accepts requests.

notes: The external Railway WOMPI backend is working correctly. Payment requests with test data return validation errors which is expected behavior - actual payments require real bank credentials. The frontend correctly integrates with the external backend at https://wompi-backend-production-7680.up.railway.app/create-payment.
